name: Max Fight The System
description:
Tips beneath and help for the last puzzle if needed

🌻Max(well) Fight The System (with Pancake)🌻

After tremondus adventure (not covered here) Maxwell and Pancake finally found YuH3R3 (prononced Youhere), the villain responsable for the disappearance of countless worker. And they are ready to stop him once and for all ! 

MFTS is a puzzle game where you stuff flowers inside a machine.

This game was made in two weeks for the GDKO2023 round 3 with the theme "Boss Fight". I was largely inspired by the boss fight in Professor Layton The Last Specter, the new Professor Layton coming up, and maybe a little tiny bit by the protest in France (it wasn't intentional).

  • Music by Ruca thank you for inspiring me with your wonderful music and for letting me use it !
  • Sounds are from Zapsplat
  • All the images are from the Internet Archive Book Images on Flickr

🏗️ GENERAL TIPS 

All the puzzles can be done in less than 10 moves (maybe even less) don't hesitate to restart,

You often don't have to move the big metal pieces,

Start by trying to find space for the big flower piece,

🌼 SPOILER read only if you are having to much trouble with the LAST PUZZLE 

Leave the two big metal pieces where they are, move a 4 flower piece between them and move the big T flower piece beneath it (that's the best start I could find).

As always thank you Lea for your aggressiv support, and special thanks to Bogy (my roommate) for playtesting my hardest games and for being here in general ! 

(Please tell me if my english is wrong)

Follow me on twitter @Puree_adventure
